snippet: No matter what the future holds for the reality TV competition, it has ushered in a golden age of baking in Britain....
abstract: Future of top-rated former BBC television show The Great British Bake Off seems uncertain following its sale to Channel 4 and loss of its host and three judges, who quit in protest; six-seasons-old competition is credited for resurgence in home baking and lifting Great Britain's dessert industry out of mediocrity; recipes for Victoria sponge cake and lemon drizzle cake offered.
lead_paragraph: No matter what the future holds for the reality TV competition, it has ushered in a golden age of baking in Britain.

headline.main: ‘The Great British Bake Off’ Changes the Way the British Bake
headline.print_headline: The Show That Changed British Baking
